Title: Mumbai’s mystery bunker to be explored
Content: Legend had it that there was tunnel below Raj Bhavan, but it wasn’t until the current Governor decided to search for it that the gubernatorial residence finally gave up its secret: a 150-metre passage
Author: Bhavya Dore
Description: Legend had it that there was tunnel below Raj Bhavan, but it wasn’t until the current Governor decided to search for it that the gubernatorial residence finally gave up its secret: a 150-metre passage
